| HistoryText             = The quintuplets were created by [[Beverly Switzler]].

After he found his cloned children, the Bong Quintuplets, watching Saturday morning cartoons, [[Lester Verde (Earth-616)|Doctor Bong]] was afraid that programming would numb their minds. So, to protect them, he created a way to actually alter the programs that were being broadcast! He also discovered an unexpected side-effect...the ability to enter the transmission and become a part of it.
